text: Scharsterbrug () is a village in De Fryske Marren in the province of Friesland, the Netherlands. It had a population of around 830 in 2017.Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2017 - CBS There is a restored windmill, De Skarrenmolen. ==History== Before 2014, Scharsterbrug was part of the Skarsterlân municipality and before 1984 it was part of Doniawerstal. ==References== ==External links== Category:De Fryske Marren Category:Populated places in Friesland
title: Scharsterbrug
